column5: Judge Says Musk Can Include Whistle-Blower Claims in Twitter Case
column6: Elon Musk’s lawyers had asked for a delay to review the accusations by a former Twitter executive, which the judge denied, while allowing the information to form part of their case.

column5: From Boom to Gloom: Tech Recruiters Struggle to Find Work
column6: As tech companies slow hiring and lay off workers, once-busy recruiters are shifting to other roles and cutting their rates.
